Body:
"""
    Testing the addition of a service
    """
api = Icinga2API(username=constants.username, password=constants.password,
    url=constants.url, debug=False)
response = api.services.add(servicename=constants.TestService_name,
    hostname=constants.TestHost_data['attrs']['name'], data=constants.
    TestService_data)
assert response['results'][0]['code'] == 200
pytest.mark.run(order=3)
